description:
Additional scenario "Muskets Arrive",  additional officer graphics including Nobunaga Oda, Shingen Takeda, and more, and traits celebrating the 40th anniversary,

- Additional Scenario
Muskets Arrive

- How to Play the Scenario
Select "New Game", and choose "Muskets Arrive" to play the scenario.

-Additional Officer Graphics
Nobunaga Oda, Kenshin Uesugi, Shingen Takeda, Yukimura Sanada, Masamune Date, Kichō

- How to Use the Additonal Graphics
Select "Custom Officers" or "Historical Officer" under the "Edit Officer" command, and set the added graphics.

- Additional Traits
"Young Innovator", "Warding Banner", "Bishamonten", "Fear Not Death", "Ōshū King", and "Oath of the Dagger".

- How to Use Additional Traits
Select "Custom Officers" or "Historical Officer" under the "Edit Officer" command, and set the added traits.
name: "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening" Scenario "Muskets Arrive", 40th Anniversary "Officer Face Graphics and Additional Traits"
